name: Gmail Full Screen Compose Tweak
description: Customisation of the full screen compose element to be less intrusive. Plus some minor adjustments in other areas of gmail to suit those that still use large desktop screens...
additional_info:
v 0.1

- Removed the dark background
- Shrank the toolbar to the left
- Made the + buttons always visible

v 0.2

- all the text edit buttons in a single toolbar

v 0.3

- added a bit bigger chat boxes and hid the categories and circles lists. If you don't want that, just remove the part bellow "larger chat boxes"
